body.name: DREAM PAIRS Womens Ballet Flats, Comfortable Slip On Business Office Dress Shoes for Women Dressy and Work with 3D Molded Insole
features: Water resistance level Not Water Resistant

Step into Comfort: Elevate your style with these ballet flats that feature a 3D insole made from breathable, moisture-wicking fabric and resilient memory foam that ensures heavenly comfort for your feet.
Support & Pressure Relief: Enjoy relief from foot pressure thanks to the enhanced arch support and U-shaped heel cup. Walk with ease and comfort throughout the day.
Walk With Ease: Experience day-long comfort with the skin-friendly and breathable lining, complemented by the padded collar that prevents heel slippage.
Flexibility & Traction: The anti-slip outsole not only provides grip and traction but also offers a relaxed walking experience, thanks to its lightweight and flexible features.
Timeless Elegance: These women's flats seamlessly combine a classic look with luxurious comfort, making them perfect for every occasion.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Exactly what I needed
reviews.reviewText: Beautiful shoes, I got a white pair and they’re exactly what I wanted, I’m just hoping they last me longer then other ones. I’m somewhere between a size 7 or 7.5 but I got a 7 and it was a contable size for me. So happy! I do wish they were cheaper though because I want them In every color :(

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Very nice shoes
reviews.reviewText: This shoes were very nice, comfortable and dressy, but unfortunately, they were half a size too big. I ordered the eight and a half first, but they were too close to my big toes. I returned them and ordered size 9, which was half a size too big. I donated the shoes.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The fit is perfect and I love them

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful shoe but too wide
reviews.reviewText: I ordered this shoe based on reviews but the shoes are too wide that they do not stay on my feet. I ordered a 9-1/2 but this seems to be a wide on me. I should also state that I have never worn a narrow shoe so I am returning them.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I am not one that wears flats at all. I live in Crocs because they are easy to keep clean. With the colder weather, I need something to cover my toes due to a medical condition from chemotherapy. I was very impressed with how these shoes arrived. These arrived in a shoe box with a nice shoe sleeve over each shoe. They also had a a card inside that if you have any issues with the shoes, to contact them and they would attempt to help you. Comfort wise, again, someone who never liked to wear flats, these are amazing! I did not feel there was a heel on them at all compared to another flat shoe I have. My feet feel very close to the ground, and I feel I have a stable walk in these which I need. They keep my toes warm, and the heel is very comfortable. What I like about the heel, there is a padding in it that is why it is raised a bit in the back. I tried to walk and move my feet several ways to get them to irritate my foot, but they never did. They are well padded shoes! I am so happy I decided to get these. I also want to add I was on the fence on size. I usually wear a 7 but lately a lot of shoes are too small or wide, but I decided to go for the 7 and am so happy I did. These fit perfectly! I am very happy with these. Comfort all the way!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars True To Size
reviews.reviewText: I ordered these in Navy in size 9. They are true to size and relatively comfortable for my wider foot. I like that they have the very slightest amount of a heel so I don't feel flat footed wearing them. They have a good amount of cushion on the sole and a slight cushion on the heel so they do not rub and they stay on your feet. I also like how high the top comes up over my toes so that it does not show toe "cleavage".If I find myself needing another pair of ballet flats in a different color, I would definitely order these again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Too high in the back
reviews.reviewText: I was excited about these ballet flats, especially for their acclaimed comfort features. The 3D insole, with its breathable fabric and memory foam, truly lives up to its promise, offering unparalleled comfort underfoot. The enhanced arch support and U-shaped heel cup are great for foot pressure relief, and the breathable lining alongside the padded collar adds to the overall comfort, preventing any heel slippage.However, there's a downside—the back of the shoe is too high for my liking, causing discomfort against the back of my foot, particularly the bone. This design flaw is a letdown, especially given the otherwise excellent features of these flats, such as the anti-slip outsole that provides both grip and flexibility for easy walking.Despite this issue, the flats exude timeless elegance, making them a versatile choice for various occasions. With a slight modification to the back, they would be perfect. For now, they remain a stylish, albeit slightly flawed, addition to my wardrobe.

Shopping, for foot wear, on line, is so difficult. I overthought my decision and ordered these shoes too big. I'm going to try to put in another insole, a heel grip as well as wear them with heavier socks. Despite my mistake, I can feel how comfortable these Dream Pairs, are. The stitching is secure and well done. The sole is sturdy, a good height and shape. They are attractive with a simple, classic look. Even the inside, foot bed is attractive and feels so good. They would be suitable for skirts, pants, dressy or casual. They deserve 5 stars; the mistake in size was my own. Don't second guess; order your regular size.

reviews.reviewTitle: Perfect if they can be broken in.
reviews.reviewText: I am a 6.5 wide and foot size wise they are very nice. No pinching at the toes, length is perfect and the sole is so comfortable.My problem comes with the band that runs around the top of the shoe. It digs in at the top of the heel and digs in just in front of the ankle on the inside. If these shoes loosen up a bit as you wear them or if the band can be stretched with a little bit of heat they will be perfect. If not, they will be unwearable. In short, if they can't be broken in, the shape of your foot will determine comfort level.

Very well put together shoe flats that are stylish and comfy to wear. Got them specifically for my office and don’t have a single complaint. Very nice to walk in without any pain, nice exterior that has a bit of elegance to it, easy to slip in and out of, night flat sole that has some padding to it, but not too much as it would add some weight to it. Will not disappoint! 10/10!!
